title: The Writer's Almanac for Wednesday, April 13, 2022
description: It's the birthday of Thomas Jefferson  (1743) who said, "In matters of style, swim with the current; in matters of principle, stand like a rock."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of Thomas Jefferson  (1743) who said, "In matters of style, swim with the current; in matters of principle, stand like a rock."
itunes:summary: It's the birthday of Thomas Jefferson  (1743) who said, "In matters of style, swim with the current; in matters of principle, stand like a rock."
